mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID AS "boardId", CATEGORY_ID AS "categoryId", WRITER AS "writer", EMAIL AS "email", TITLE AS "title", WRITE_DATE AS "writeDate", READ_COUNT AS "readCount", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_ID=REPLY_BOARD_NUM) AS "commentCount", RNUM AS "seq" FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_ID, WRITER, EMAIL, TITLE, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, REPLY_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_ID=#{categoryId} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT BOARD_ID AS "boardId", CATEGORY_ID AS "categoryId", WRITER AS "writer", EMAIL AS "email", TITLE AS "title", CONTENT AS "content", READ_COUNT AS "readCount", WRITE_DATE AS "writeDate" FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_ID, WRITER, EMAIL, TITLE, CONTENT, WRITE_DATE) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{categoryId}, #{writer}, #{email}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE)

INSERT INTO BOARD_UPLOAD_FILE (FILE_ID, BOARD_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, FILE_SIZE, FILE_CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_DATA) VALUES (#{fileId}, #{boardId}, #{fileName}, #{fileOriginalName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileData})
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_ID AS "fileId", BOARD_ID AS "boardId", FILE_NAME AS "fileName", FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME AS "fileOriginalName", FILE_SIZE AS "fileSize", FILE_CONTENT_TYPE AS "fileContentType", FILE_DATA AS "fileData" FROM BOARD_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}

SELECT FILE_ID AS "fileId", BOARD_ID AS "boardId", FILE_NAME AS "fileName", FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME AS "fileOriginalName", FILE_SIZE AS "fileSize", FILE_CONTENT_TYPE AS "fileContentType", FILE_DATA AS "fileData" FROM BOARD_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE FILE_ID=#{fileId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CATEGORY_ID=#{categoryId}, WRITER=#{writer}, EMAIL=#{email}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content}, WRITE_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID=#{boardId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD_UPLOAD_FILE WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT BOARD_ID FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD.BOARD_ID=#{boardId} AND BOARD.BOARD_ID = BOARD_UPLOAD_FILE.BOARD_ID )
DELETE FROM REPLY WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT BOARD_ID FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD.BOARD_ID=#{boardId} AND BOARD.BOARD_ID = REPLY.REPLY_BOARD_NUM )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE #{keyword} OR CONTENT LIKE #{keyword}

SELECT BOARD_ID AS "boardId", CATEGORY_ID AS "categoryId", WRITER AS "writer", EMAIL AS "email", TITLE AS "title", WRITE_DATE AS "writeDate", READ_COUNT AS "readCount", RNUM AS "seq" FROM ( SELECT BOARD_ID, CATEGORY_ID, WRITER, EMAIL, TITLE, WRITE_DATE, READ_COUNT, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE TITLE LIKE #{keyword} OR CONTENT LIKE #{keyword} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC ) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
